name: github user
shortDescription: Gives the user info about the github user
longDescription:
"/github" command is divided into 2 subcommands: "/github user" & "/github repository"
- "/github user" gives the user info about the github user.
- "/github repository" gives info about the github repository

options.name: username
options.description: The username of the github user

name: github repository
shortDescription: Gives the repository info about the github repository
longDescription:
"/github" command is divided into 2 subcommands: "/github user" & "/github repository"
- "/github user" gives the user info about the github user.
- "/github repository" gives info about the github repository

options.name: repository
options.description: The repository of the github user

name: help commandlist
shortDescription: Shows the list of available commands
longDescription:
"/help" command is divided into two subcommands: "/help commandlist" and "help command"
- "/help commandlist" displays the list of commands that are available.
- "/help command" displays the information for the specific command that user provides the input for.

name: help command
shortDescription: Shows information about a specific command
longDescription:
"/help" command is divided into two subcommands: "/help commandlist" and "help command"
- "/help commandlist" displays the list of commands that are available.
- "/help command" displays the information for the specific command that user provides the input for.

options.name: command
options.description: The command you want to get information about

name: run
shortDescription: Runs the javascript code that user provides
longDescription: Runs the javascript code that user provides

options.name: console
options.description: Whether to show the output in console or not (default: true)

options.name: showcode
options.description: Show the input code or not (default: true)

name: stats
longDescription: Shows the bot's statistics related to general to system information.
